title: Nicola McLean claims Coleen Rooney 'is used to being betrayed'
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Nicola McLean has hit out at Coleen Rooney with savage digs about her private life, after Wayne Rooney’s wife sparked a huge feud with Rebekah Vardy.

It is all kicking off…

The world was thrown into chaos when the mum-of-four shared a statement on Instagram earlier this week, claiming Rebekah had been selling stories about her to the press.

And Nicola McLean has waded head-first into the drama, suggesting the 33-year-old should be calling out other people in her life for their behaviour instead…

Advertisement

Advertisement

Debating the row with Eamonn Holmes, Ruth Langsford and Vanessa Feltz on This Morning, she fumed: ‘If Coleen wants to be this outspoken, maybe she needs to be outing other people in her life as well.

‘Why would she out Rebekah?’

But Vanessa was having none of it, replying: ‘Why shouldn’t she? I think if you feel you’ve been targeted and betrayed [by] someone who pretends to be your friend and is supposed to be close to you, and you know they’re peddling your secrets, that’s very hurtful.

Nicola McLean hit out at Coleen Rooney (Picture: ITV)

However, Nicola wouldn’t let the issue lie, interrupting Vanessa to claim, ‘she’s used to being betrayed’, before adding Coleen and Rebekah weren’t close in the first place.

Coleen and husband Wayne haven’t had the easiest time in their marriage, after it emerged the former Manchester United footballer had a threesome with two escorts in 2009 – when his wife was pregnant with their third child.

He was recently forced to hit out at claims he cheated once again, after he was pictured in a hotel lobby with a mystery woman.

‘Nothing happened between me and any girl on that night in Vancouver,’ he said at the time. ‘I did not enter the lift alone with the girl pictured in the hotel foyer.

Coleen Rooney and husband Wayne share four children together (Picture: AFP)

‘The girl pictured in the club was simply one of many who innocently asked for autographs and pictures.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘The whole story was a smear against me. It is damaging to my family and not something I am prepared to put up with.’

Coleen made headlines this week after she dropped a statement on Instagram, accusing Rebekah of selling stories about her to the press.

‘For a few years now someone I trusted to follow me on my personal Instagram account has been consistently informing The Sun newspaper of my private posts and stories,’ she wrote.

Rebekah Vardy denied all Coleen’s allegations (Picture: Getty)

‘There has been so much information given to them about me, my friends and my family – all without my permission or knowledge. After a long time of trying to figure out who it could be, for various reasons, I had a suspicion.

‘To try and prove this, I came up with an idea. I blocked everyone from viewing my Instagram stories except ONE account. (Those on my private account must have been wondering why I haven’t had stories on there for a while.)

‘Over the past five months I have posted a series of false stories if they made their way into the Sun newspaper. And you know what, they did! The story about gender selection in Mexico, the story about returning to TV and then the latest story about the basement flooding in my new house.

‘It’s been tough keeping it to myself and not making any comment at all, especially when the stories have been leaked, however I had to. Now I know for certain which account/individual it’s come from.

Advertisement

‘I have saved and screenshotted all the original stories which clearly show just one person has viewed them. It’s…… Rebekah Vardy’s account.’

The post took on a life of its own, with WAGatha Christie trending on Twitter and memes taking over social media.

Rebekah – who is currently pregnant with her fifth child – hit back shortly after, denying all the claims and hitting out at her former pal for not contacting her first.

She also insisted she would be looking into who else had access to her Instagram page.
